data_table.description: The dataset includes medical history data (e.g. APOE genotye, availability of autopsy data, Braak stage information, etc.) and information of prevalent/incident AD status of subjects for whom whole exome sequencing data are available. A variable/data of AD status (control/case) were added to provide quick overview information. This dataset will be updated annually and when compared to dataset: CaseControlEnrichedPhenotypesWES (which reflects data status of study version 5), will allow convenient observation of changes in phenotype data across time.

variable.name: IncAD
variable.comment: Please refer to variable=Comment for details

variable.name: Age
variable.description: Age at Onset for Cases; Age at Last Exam for Controls
variable.comment: Please refer to variable=Comment for details

variable.name: Age_baseline
variable.description: Age at baseline (first examined; entered study)

variable.name: Race
variable.value: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Hispanic or Latino or Not Hispanic or Latino

variable.name: Selection
variable.description: Indicator variable for how individual was selected

variable.name: AD
variable.comment: Variable = AD meant to provide a quick overview; for analyses, it is recommended to use the variables IncAD and PrevAD instead.
